plot outline: Titoo and his wife Gulshan are on the brink of divorce. They meet with their respective lawyers to discuss their cases. Titoo recounts how his financial condition was in dire straits as several businesses which he started had failed due to one reason or other. His angry creditors had forcefully entered his home and looted most of his possessions. As if this was not enough, Titoo's father was hit on his head during the melee and due to injury to his brain, had regressed to his childhood. Gulshan on her part explains that their marriage had been blissful in the beginning and they were both very much in love. But soon she discovered that Titoo was not being truthful with her which ruined their relationship. Meanwhile, Titoo explains to his lawyer as to how the mounting debts forced him to take a drastic step and enter a lucrative but socially unacceptable profession.
title: Titoo MBA
plot: A couple on the brink of divorce explain their separate viewpoints and reasons to their respective lawyers.

But soon she discovered that Titoo was not being truthful with her which ruined their relationship.
